location.sjis: プロスバンの町 南門公園

dialogue.sjis: いや〜 やっぱり平和が一番だね
dialogue.ascii: Phew I wouldn't replace this kind of peace for anything in the world!

dialogue.sjis: 鍛冶師見習いの子供が 世界を救ったって噂だ
dialogue.ascii: Get this! I heard a Craftknight's apprentice saved the world! And they're so young!

dialogue.sjis: さすがにそんな噂は 信じられないよな
dialogue.ascii: Frankly, rumors like that are a little hard to believe, though.

dialogue.sjis: ちくしょう、イカサマばれちまったよ 笑いたければ笑えよ
dialogue.ascii: Damn, they caught onto my schemes! What're you looking at? Don't you laugh at me!

dialogue.sjis: プロスバンの町の創設者 勇者プロスバンの石像
dialogue.ascii: The Founder Of This City, Our Hero Prosban
